ValidationRule.description: BLock anyone setting good standing other than an AR agent
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ischanged(AR_Status__c), Text(AR_Status__c) = "In Good Standing", $UserRole.Name <> "Accounts Receivable", $UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator (No Calendar Sync)" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only AR Agents Can set "In Good Standing"
